text: Parantu sauthi vadhare duniyana jivana mate lobhi, he nabi! Tame te'one ja pamaso, a jivanana lobhi musariko karata pana vadhare che, te'o manthi to dareka vyakti eka hajara varsani vaya icche che, jo ke a vaya apavi pana te'one yatanathi chutakaro nahi apave, allaha ta'ala te'ona karyone khuba ja sari rite jo'i rahyo che
